content: काकलिः, --ली {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A low and sweet tone; अनुबद्धमुग्धकाकलीसहितं <ls>U. 3</ls>; <ls>Rs. 1. 8.</ls> {@--2@} A musical instrument with a low tone used by thieves to ascertain whether a person is asleep or not; फणिमुखकाकलीसंदंशक… प्रभृत्यनेकोपकरणयुक्तः <ls>Dk. 49.</ls> {@--3@} Scissors. {@--4@} The Guñjā plant.
